product_results.title: GHOST Energy Drink - 12-Pack, Sour Patch Kids Redberry, 16oz - Energy & Focus & No Artificial Colors - 200mg of Natural Caffeine, L-Carnitine & Taurine - Gluten-Free & Vegan
delivery: FREE delivery December 28 - January 3 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

item_ingredients: Carbonated Water, Citric Acid, Natural and Artificial Flavor, Acetyl-L-Carnitine HCl, Taurine, Tartaric Acid, Natural Caffeine (from Coffee Bean), Sodium Benzoate (Preservative), Potassium Sorbate (Preservative) Sucralose, Alpha-Gpc (Alpha-Glyceryl Phosphoryl Choline 50%), Ascorbic Acid, Acesulfame Potassium, Neurofactor Coffee (Coffee Arabica) Fruit Extract, Astragin (10:1 Astragalus Membranaceus and 50:1 Panax Notoginseng) Root Extract, Niacinamide, D-Calcium Pantothenate, Biotin, Pyridoxine HCl, Thiamine HCl, Folic Acid, Cyanocobalamin.
about_item: Feel Good Energy: GHOST Energy is the fully transparent, fully loaded energy drink we’ve all been waiting for. Authentic Flavors. Zero Sugars.* No BS. Authentic Sour Patch Kids “Redberry” flavor. 12-pack case contains 16oz cans. Only intended for persons 18 years or older. *GHOST Energy is low in calories.

Legendary Energy: This drink contains 200mg of Natural Caffeine from coffee beans, which has been found anecdotally to deliver a smooth, feel-good energy with less jitters and no crash when compared to other forms of caffeine.*

Epic Focus*: GHOST Energy combines the nootropics of Carnipure L-Carnitine, Alpha-GPC, Neurofactor, and AstraGin to help your body convert fatty acids into energy, support brain and cognitive function, and absorb a wide range of nutrients.*

Total Transparency: All GHOST products feature a transparent label that fully discloses the dose of each active ingredient. Zero proprietary blends means you know what you’re getting in each and every sip. GHOST Energy is vegan friendly, gluten free, and contains zero sugars.* *GHOST Energy is low in calories.

Perfect Energy and Focus Combo: GHOST Energy is a full disclosure energy drink that delivers on efficacy and the info to ensure you know exactly what you're getting in every can. Combining 200mg of natural caffeine with nootropics to deliver the perfect combo of energy and focus.*

sponsored_brands.name: ZOA ENERGY LLC
sponsored_brands.headline: Sugar Free Energy Drinks Packed With Electrolytes

summary.text: Customers find this energy drink has a good taste that's not too sour, and appreciate its natural caffeine content of 200mg with L-Carnitine and Taurine. The drink provides sustained energy throughout the day and delivers a refreshing boost without jitters or crashes. Customers consider it good value for money, with one noting it's as good as Monster, though some report issues with leaking cans.

authors_reviews.title: Great taste
authors_reviews.text: Husband loves them, great taste and great price! Zero sugar and energy boost
authors_reviews.author: Misty Farthing

authors_reviews.title: SWEDISH FISH FLAVOR WILL NEVER BE BEAT – My All-Time Favorite Energy Drink!
authors_reviews.text: MY FAVORITE FLAVOR OF ALL TIME. HOPE IT STAYSLet me just say—Swedish Fish flavor is hands down my absolute favorite, and I don't think any other energy drink will ever top it. It has a sweet, fruity, candy-like taste that's just perfect. I never really was a Swedish Fish candy eater, but I can’t get enough of this drink! I seriously look forward to cracking open a can every time. It’s not too sugary, with a perfect balance that gives you just the right amount of energy and focus without the dreaded crash.The 16oz cans are the perfect size, and I love how Ghost packs that much-needed energy boost while keeping the flavors fresh and exciting. I’ve been buying these all year long, and every time it’s like rediscovering that childhood candy with an awesome energy kick.I did have one instance where half of my shipment arrived damaged, but no worries—Amazon was super quick to send out a replacement case. Excellent customer service, as always! Now, I’m back to enjoying my Swedish Fish cans with no interruptions.I really hope this flavor sticks around because it is hands down the best in their lineup. If you're a fan of Swedish Fish candy, you absolutely have to try this flavor. It’s a total game-changer!
authors_reviews.author: Occifer Cody

authors_reviews.title: Legendary
authors_reviews.text: Great taste, perfect amount of caffeine per drink and a solid price! Not to mention these bad boys keep me locked in 😎👀😤
authors_reviews.author: DC

authors_reviews.title: Great product, horrible packaging
authors_reviews.text: Super delicious, just wish it was packaged better. 3 cases(36 cans) in one box is a bit too much, also would be nice if it was labeled contents under pressure so the boxes aren't thrown onto my porch. One can busted entirely in half and even that was too much for my soul to handle these drinks are that good!
authors_reviews.author: Jamie

authors_reviews.title: Daily Drinker Warning: Great Energy, but Watch Your Teeth!
authors_reviews.text: No sugar which is great and this energy drink has become a staple but it is also very acidic so watch out if you have very thin teeth like me. I often find it increasing my sensitivity by a lot so a sensitivity toothpaste daily is essential for me since I drink these daily.The feeling or energy from these is great, I have been drinking similar ones like G fuel for years and this gives me significantly more energy. A quick tip though is many dollar trees have Gfuel available so if you need sugar free energy drinks like me, they provide cheaper deals - currently dollar tree has G fuel for 1.25$ a can which is quite cost effective compared to Ghost.Drinkability is mixed with Ghost, they are strong drinks. I often find G fuel being very refreshing and enjoyable while Ghost is very concentrated.Comparison - Gfuel vs. Ghost ingredients and focusGhost:Focus - Cognitive function, energy metabolism, and premium/transparent sourcing.Caffeine - Natural from coffee beansNootropics - Alpha-GPC, NeuroFactor™ Coffee Fruit Extract.Performance - Carnipure® L-Carnitine L-Tartrate, Taurine.What makes it unique - AstraGin® (absorption enhancer), transparent proprietary blends.Sweeteners - Sucralose, Acesulfame Potassium.Gfuel:Focus - support for focus and antioxidants.Caffeine - syntheticNootropics - L-tyrosine and L-theaninePerformance - Taurine, L-citrulline malateWhat makes it unique - Extensive Antioxidant Complex, high dose of Vitamins C, E, and B-vitamins.Sweeteners - Sucralose, Acesulfame Potassium.The bottom line here: G Fuel for maximum boost and vitamins; Ghost for premium, clean, and focused energy. Ghost is mostly proprietary blends of vitamins which is something to keep in mind since we do not know what is in them while G fuel is more transparent for the most part. I recommend trying both and seeing what works best for you.
authors_reviews.author: Zach

authors_reviews.title: Quality Energy Drink
authors_reviews.text: Honestly on par with Ryse in terms of flavor. I love this sour green apple flavor more than any of the other flavors. It tastes good, helps performance in the gym, and I don’t crash afterwards.
authors_reviews.author: EllaBlu

authors_reviews.title: Best energy drink ever
authors_reviews.text: This stuff is incredible. It tastes exactly like it says and brings that sour packed punch! One sour green apple a day keeps....well ok I am not going to make that statement, but this stuff rocks!
authors_reviews.author: Zachary Johnson

authors_reviews.title: Great drink with a boost
authors_reviews.text: If you are a Swedish fish fan these are amazing. The sour patch ones are also delicious. Low sugar and good energy that doesn’t crash. It’s a hit in our household for grab and go.
authors_reviews.author: Lovetheoutdoors
